title: Indian Drugs, Sold Worldwide, Sometimes Deadly
description: Deaths from contaminated cough syrups in Gambia have brought attention to loose regulations in India and a lack of testing capacity in poor importing nations.
dc:creator: Hari Kumar, Saikou Jammeh, Mujib Mashal and Elian Peltier

media:content.media:credit: Xavier Galiana/Agence France-Presse â€” Getty Images
media:content.media:description: The deaths of Gambian children were linked to cough syrups produced by Maiden Pharmaceuticals in India.
